name: Animita Defenders
description:
as a team, this is one of the projects we made during the second half of 2020. due to the pandemic we couldn't do much properly due to lack of communication. but it was fun either way

You need to have a gamepad connected, or else the game won't allow you to play. (once the game loads, and you have a gamepad connected, be sure to press [ENTER] to start the game.)

Controlls:

Player 1 (Gamepad):

Fight the ghosts, move around with the D-Pad and attack with A, you can hold the right shoulderpad button and then press A to perform an uppercut.

Player 2 (Keyboard):

Kick the ball to the left net, each time you kick the ball into the net,  a column of light dissapears from the animita, kick the ball 5 times into the net to win.

You cannot kill or harm the enemies, the Player 1 needs to protect you.

You move around with "W, A, S, D"

--------------

Programming: Tomás "Nebby" Guerrero

Graphical Assets:  Cristobal .E Vera
